title: Chapter 4340 - Chapter 4340: 4339 Reappeared In The Universe
body:
Chapter 4340 - Chapter 4340: 4339 Reappeared In The Universe

Chapter 4340: 4339 reappeared in the universe

Translator: 549690339

The leader of the water god Dragon of the Dragon Palace had achieved a breakthrough. This was a joyous occasion for the Dragon Palace.

However, Wang Xian would need to look for the quota to break through the Heaven Creation Realm and the universe that he had broken through.

In the universe that Wang Xian knew and understood.

The Sword and Magic Universe had water-type powerhouses in the heaven creation realm.

The last time he went to the Na Tian universe, the water element quota was occupied by the scholar.

He knew of a universe that had the water element quota, and that was the six paths universe.

However, the six paths universe was the universe that heaven bestowed.

The tribe that heaven bestowed was the water element tribe. Wang Xian was too embarrassed to occupy the quota of the six paths universe.

Wang Xian would have to search for this spot himself.

However, after checking the information in the Heaven’s origin communication device, Wang Xian did not find any information about the selling spot.

The spot in the Heaven’s origin creation was a foundation for a universe.

Once it was sold, it would feel like digging one’s own grave.

A universe would not sell a spot unless it was in a critical situation.

However, there were a few universes that sent out a message asking for help. Wang Xian immediately contacted them below.

The reward that he wanted was naturally a water element spot.

However, the result that Wang Xian received was that the other party rejected it.

Or perhaps, the other party did not have a spot in the water element of the Heaven’s origin blessed realm in the other universe!

“I can’t find it here in the Heaven’s origin communicator. Looks like I have to go out and look for it myself.”

Wang Xian mumbled.

He was not anxious about this quota.

It was not that easy to find such a quota.

For example, it had been a long time since the skeleton race found a universe with a quota of darkness attribute.

“Let’s Wait a little longer. It seems that there are still disciples who are about to reach the bottleneck of breaking through.”

Wang Xian looked into the primal chaos stone.

The arrival of bei Shuang.

The arrival of the leader of the Water God Dragon.

This made Wang Xian sense this aura.

When they reached the threshold of breaking through, their bodies would emit a transcendent aura.

In the primal chaos stone, Wang Xian sensed that there were still disciples who were about to reach.

Time passed once again. Ten thousand years in the outside world and one million years in the primal chaos stone.

On this day, Wang Xian sensed something and looked inside.

“Roar! Roar!”

An excited roar came from inside.

The leader of the Fire Elemental Divine Dragon, who was emitting the power of flames, swayed his body.

“Congratulations, leader of the Fire Elemental Divine Dragon!”

In the primal Chaos Stone, the rest of the disciples who were at the peak of the ruler realm looked over and congratulated him!

“Hehe, I’ll take my leave first. I’ll be waiting for my brothers in the Heaven’s origin blessed realm.”

Leader Huo said excitedly.

Then, he flew out of the primal chaos stone and looked at Wang Xian. Immediately, he turned into his human form and knelt in front of him.

“Greetings, Dragon King. I have lived up to your high expectations. I have reached the threshold of a breakthrough.”

Leader Huo knelt there and said respectfully.

Wang Xian nodded and said, “Wait here with leader Shui. I’ll help you find a spot next.”

“It’s the Dragon King!”

Chief Huo replied respectfully.

Wang Xian looked at the primal chaos stone and his gaze landed on Mo Sha.

Mo Sha’s strength had already reached the control level.

Furthermore, it was comparable to two existences at the control level.

This strength was already very strong.

However, he could still improve.

However, the improvement was already very slow.

Other than the resources that Wang Xian had prepared for himself, the rest of the resources in Wang Xian’s hands had been used up.

“Mo Sha!”

Wang Xian transmitted his voice to Mo Sha.

“Dragon King!”

When Mo Sha heard him, he immediately flew out and stood respectfully beside Wang Xian.

“I’ll be out for a period of time. You take care of everything here first. If anything unexpected happens, bring all the disciples away.”

Wang Xian instructed Mo Sha.

“It’s the Dragon King!”

Mo Sha nodded.

“Okay, you guys can cultivate outside for the time being.”

Wang Xian also kept the primal chaos stone.

He had no choice. This time, he had to go to the primal chaos to look for a spot for a breakthrough. Hence, he had to take this primal chaos stone away and fuse it into his body.

“It’s the Dragon King!”

The group of disciples came out from the primal chaos stone and nodded.

Wang Xian gave some instructions to the demonic fiend and flew out with an lie.

Right now, the Fallen Shadow Demonic Emperor was here as well as a group of experts from the nine-origin universe.

After he left, no one dared to touch the palace of the Dragon Palace or the fragments of the Elemental God.

Of course, with Wang Xian’s current reputation, no one was courting death and provoking the Dragon Palace.

“I’ll go to the sky-absorbing universe to take a look first.”

Wang Xian flew quickly. There was a place in his heart.

The sky-absorbing universe was the universe where the scholar made his breakthrough.

There were two powerhouses in the sky-absorbing universe who were at the Heaven origin creation level. Both of them were at the control level.

One of them, the Haoyang saint, was a fire-attributed powerhouse.

Wang Xian did not have a good impression of the Haoyang saint and the Buddha saint.

He used living beings as livestock to trade with the powerhouses of the evil universe.

Wang Xian was prepared to go over again to see if he could meet the Haoyang saint.

If he could find him, he was confident that he could destroy him completely.

That was because he had the divination lamp now.

The divination lamp.

With his strength, using the divination lamp, he could lock onto a powerhouse at the control level.

However, the prerequisite was that Wang Xian could touch him.

Only by touching him would he be able to lock onto him.

With this thought in mind, Wang Xian flew rapidly.

The distance to the Na Tian universe was very far and was not within the boundaries of the Justice Alliance universe.

It would take him at least ten thousand years to fly there.

However, there was nothing he could do about it.

Time was the most worthless thing in the Chaos!

Moreover, the calamity had only just begun. It had not even been 200 million years!

Wang Xian shuttled through the chaos.

His full speed was still extremely terrifying!

Ten thousand years later, Wang Xian arrived in front of the Na Tian universe. Looking at this universe from afar, he shook his head slightly.

The living beings in this universe were also sad!

The Saints were heartless!

However, the soul-returning wood branch that I gave to the old man did not ask for help. Saint Futu and Saint Haoyang should not have continued to kill the innocent

Wang Xian thought to himself. He concealed his figure and entered the Na Tian universe.

Hopefully, he is still in this universe

When he arrived at the Na Tian universe, Wang Xian immediately took out the divination lamp!

“Is there a strong person in the Heaven’s origin destiny realm in this universe?”

Wang Xian began his divination.

Soon, the divination lamp sent him a message.

The answer was yes!

Where was the location?

Wang Xian continued his divination.

Soon, a map was displayed on the divination lamp.

His eyes sparkled when he saw the information on the map.

“Looks like I have to kill the saint of the Na Tian Universe!”

Wang Xian narrowed his eyes. His eyes were filled with coldness.

According to the map displayed by the divination lamp, Wang Xian flew forward.
